biocontainers.name: brig
biocontainers.summary: Brig is a cross-platform (windows/mac/unix) application that can display circular comparisons between a large number of genomes, with a focus on handling genome assembly data.

biotools.summary: BRIG is a cross-platform (Windows/Mac/Unix) application that can display circular comparisons between a large number of genomes, with a focus on handling genome assembly data.

bioschemas.name: BLAST Ring Image Generator
bioschemas.summary: BRIG is a cross-platform (Windows/Mac/Unix) application that can display circular comparisons between a large number of genomes, with a focus on handling genome assembly data.
